headline: The Allstate (ALL) Announces Estimated Catastrophe Losses for August
summary: The Allstate Corporation (NYSE:ALL) is one of the Best Undervalued Stocks to Invest in According to Reddit. On September 18, the company announced estimated catastrophe losses for August of $213 million or $168 million, after-tax. The catastrophe losses for the month included 10 events with ~70% of the losses associated with three wind and hail events. The total catastrophe […]
